verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
O Christmas tree O Christmas tree,
You stand in verdant beauty.
O Christmas tree O Christmas tree,
You stand in verdant beauty.

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
Your boughs are green in summer's glow,
And do not fade in winter's snow.
O Christmas tree O Christmas tree,
You stand in verdant beauty.

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
O Christmas tree, O Christmas tree,
Thy leaves are so unchanging,
O Christmas tree, O Christmas tree,
Thy leaves are so unchanging;

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
Not only green when summer's here,
But also when 'tis cold and drear.
O Christmas tree, O Christmas tree,
Thy leaves are so unchanging!

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
O Christmas tree, O Christmas tree,
Thy candles shine so brightly,

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
O Christmas tree, O Christmas tree,
Thy candles shine so brightly!

verse.name: v5a
verse.lines:
O Christmas Tree, O Christmas Tree,
You bear a wondrous message!
O Christmas Tree, O Christmas Tree,
You bear a wondrous message!

verse.name: v5b
verse.lines:
You do proclaim the Savior's birth,
Good will to men and peace on earth.
O Christmas Tree, O Christmas Tree,
You bear a wondrous message!

verse.name: v6a
v6b
verse.lines:
Each year you bring to me delight
Gleaming in the Christmas night.
O christmas tree, O Christmas tree,
Of all the trees most lovely.

verse.name: v7a
verse.lines:
O Christmas tree, O Christmas tree,
Your leaves will teach me also,
O Christmas tree, O Christmas tree,
Your leaves will teach me also

verse.name: v7b
verse.lines:
That hope and love and faithfulness
Are precious things I can possess.
O Christmas tree, O Christmas tree,
Your leaves will teach me also.
